欠.definition: to owe; to lack; (literary) to be deficient in; (bound form) yawn; to raise slightly (a part of one's body)

欠債.definition: to owe a debt; the sum owed

欠扁.definition: annoying; infuriating; deserving of a good spanking

欠抽.definition: (coll.) to deserve a slap in the face

欠款.definition: to owe a debt; balance due; debts

欠缺.definition: to be deficient in; lapse; deficiency

欠薪.definition: to owe wages; back pay; wages arrears

欠費.definition: to be in arrears; to be out of credit; amount owing

欠賬.definition: to owe a debt; debt; obligation

欠身.definition: to half rise out of one's chair (a polite gesture)
